Class Order

java.lang.Object
com.needleandstitch.pavuk.model.Order
@Entity public class Order extends Object
An entity class for order.

This class serves as a model for the order table in the database.

Since:
15.12.2024
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Needle & Stitch
